attributes.action: Stop Alcohol Being Advertised So Much
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please can alcohol stop being advertised so much.  People are drinking more these days down to the amount of advertising.  Tv programmes are sponsored by different alcohol, even supermarket adverts, have to advertise it these days.  They can not just advertise food.  No wonder there are so many people drinking heavy these days.  Please stop the advertising (like cigarettes).
